name: bAlive
description:
bAlive is a short experiential game, visually inspired by late 90s console titles. Delve into the unknown future, and keep the creature charged. The narrative is told through prop, audio and level design. bAlive is a reflection of the human condition and social commentary on the state of life in 2021.

bAlive is intended to be played with a game controller, but can be played with keyboard/mouse.
